snippet.title: Strayed Lights - Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Explore a dark and oneiric world of rampant nature and corrupted cities. Embody a tiny being of light on its path towards awakening. Fight your inner demons, confront and soothe other Strayed Lights deformed by their own emotions. Restore your inner balance to gain new abilities and grow.

Coming spring 2023 - https://linktr.ee/strayedlights

Wishlist:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2162020/Strayed_Lights
https://store.epicgames.com/p/strayed-lights-351d29
https://www.gog.com/game/strayed_lights1
https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10006909
